short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: What's your stuff worth on eBay? Find out!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is this worth on eBay? Thats a common question before selling your stuff on eBay. The eValuator App determines the average eBay value of an article from the successfully sold items of the last few weeks. 
Very useful to find out what you can earn selling something on eBay, or to check if a supposed bargain may be cheaper on eBay. The ideal companion for flea market, yard sales and more ... 

Advice: Experience with eBay website (completed listings) is nessecary to fully take advantage of this app!

Features: 
=====================
* supports ebay.co.uk
* Calculates Median, price range and net profit
* Search in subcategories
* Filter by condition (new, used, ...) 
* display the detailed results 

Copyright:
===================
